trans-unit.source: The property names represented by xx above are limited to the Unicode general category properties. Each character has exactly one such property, specified by a two-letter abbreviation. For compatibility with Perl, negation can be specified by including a circumflex between the opening brace and the property name. For example, \p{^Lu} is the same as \P{Lu}.
trans-unit.target: 上面的 xx 表示的属性名称仅限于Unicode常规类别属性。每个字符都有一个这样的属性，由两个字母的缩写指定。为了与Perl兼容，可以通过在大括号和属性名称之间包含一个抑音符来指定否定。例如， \p{^Lu} 与 \P{Lu} 。

trans-unit.source: The pseudo-variable $this is available inside any class method when that method is called from within an object context. $this is a reference to the calling object (usually the object to which the method belongs, but possibly another object, if the method is called statically from the context of a secondary object).
trans-unit.target: 当从对象上下文中调用该方法时，伪变量 $this 可以在任何类方法中使用。 $this 是对调用对象的引用（通常是该方法所属的对象，但如果从辅助对象的上下文中静态调用该方法，则可能是另一个对象）。

trans-unit.source: The pseudo-variable $this is available when a method is called from within an object context. $this is a reference to the calling object (usually the object to which the method belongs, but possibly another object, if the method is called statically from the context of a secondary object). As of PHP 7.0.0 calling a non-static method statically from an incompatible context results in $this being undefined inside the method. Calling a non-static method statically from an incompatible context has been deprecated as of PHP 5.6.0. As of PHP 7.0.0 calling a non-static method statically has been generally deprecated (even if called from a compatible context). Before PHP 5.6.0 such calls already triggered a strict notice.
trans-unit.target: 从对象上下文中调用方法时，伪变量 $this 可用。 $this 是对调用对象的引用（通常是该方法所属的对象，但如果从辅助对象的上下文中静态调用该方法，则可能是另一个对象）。从PHP 7.0.0开始，从不兼容的上下文中静态调用非静态方法会导致$ this在方法内部未定义。从PHP 5.6.0开始，不赞成从不兼容的上下文中静态调用非静态方法。自PHP 7.0.0起，通常不建议静态调用非静态方法（即使从兼容上下文调用）。在PHP 5.6.0之前，此类调用已经触发了严格的通知。

trans-unit.source: The reference counter of the returned object will be incremented by one to protect internal structures against premature destruction when the method is called from a user callback. So the EventBufferEvent object should be freed explicitly with EventBufferEvent::free() method. Otherwise memory will leak.
trans-unit.target: 当从用户回调中调用该方法时，返回对象的引用计数器将增加一，以保护内部结构免于过早破坏。因此，应使用EventBufferEvent :: free（）方法显式释放EventBufferEvent对象。否则，内存将泄漏。

trans-unit.source:
The return value of __set() is ignored because of the way PHP processes the assignment operator. Similarly, __get() is never called when chaining assignments together like this: 
 $a = $obj->b = 8;
trans-unit.target:
__set（）的返回值被忽略，因为PHP处理赋值运算符的方式。同样，将分配链接在一起时，永远不会调用__get（）： 
 $a = $obj->b = 8;

trans-unit.source:
The return value of __set() is ignored because of the way PHP processes the assignment operator. Similarly, __get() is never called when chaining assignments together like this: 
 $a = $obj->b = 8;
trans-unit.target:
__set（）的返回值被忽略，因为PHP处理赋值运算符的方式。同样，将分配链接在一起时，永远不会调用__get（）：
 $ a = $ obj-> b = 8;

trans-unit.source: The size of an integer is platform-dependent, although a maximum value of about two billion is the usual value (that's 32 bits signed). 64-bit platforms usually have a maximum value of about 9E18, except on Windows prior to PHP 7, where it was always 32 bit. PHP does not support unsigned integers. Integer size can be determined using the constant PHP_INT_SIZE, maximum value using the constant PHP_INT_MAX since PHP 5.0.5, and minimum value using the constant PHP_INT_MIN since PHP 7.0.0.

trans-unit.source: The status can be PGSQL_TRANSACTION_IDLE (currently idle), PGSQL_TRANSACTION_ACTIVE (a command is in progress), PGSQL_TRANSACTION_INTRANS (idle, in a valid transaction block), or PGSQL_TRANSACTION_INERROR (idle, in a failed transaction block). PGSQL_TRANSACTION_UNKNOWN is reported if the connection is bad. PGSQL_TRANSACTION_ACTIVE is reported only when a query has been sent to the server and not yet completed.
trans-unit.target: 状态可以是 PGSQL_TRANSACTION_IDLE （当前空闲）， PGSQL_TRANSACTION_ACTIVE （命令正在执行）， PGSQL_TRANSACTION_INTRANS （有效事务块中的空闲）或 PGSQL_TRANSACTION_INERROR （失败事务块中的空闲）。如果连接不良，则报告 PGSQL_TRANSACTION_UNKNOWN 。仅当查询已发送到服务器但尚未完成时，才报告 PGSQL_TRANSACTION_ACTIVE 。

trans-unit.source: The string in PHP is implemented as an array of bytes and an integer indicating the length of the buffer. It has no information about how those bytes translate to characters, leaving that task to the programmer. There are no limitations on the values the string can be composed of; in particular, bytes with value 0 (“NUL bytes”) are allowed anywhere in the string (however, a few functions, said in this manual not to be “binary safe”, may hand off the strings to libraries that ignore data after a NUL byte.)
trans-unit.target: PHP中的字符串实现为字节数组和表示缓冲区长度的整数。它没有有关这些字节如何转换为字符的信息，该任务留给了程序员。字符串可以组成的值没有限制；特别是，在字符串的任何位置都允许使用值为 0 的字节（“ NUL字节”）（但是，本手册中提到的一些函数不是“二进制安全的”函数）可能会将字符串传递给忽略字符串的库。 NUL字节。）

trans-unit.source: The tag UserComment has the same problem as the Copyright tag. It can store two values. First the encoding used, and second the value itself. If so the IFD section only contains the encoding or a byte array. The COMPUTED section will store both in the entries UserCommentEncoding and UserComment. The entry UserComment is available in both cases so it should be used in preference to the value in IFD0 section.
trans-unit.target: 标记 UserComment 与版权标记具有相同的问题。它可以存储两个值。首先是所使用的编码，其次是值本身。如果是这样，则 IFD 部分仅包含编码或字节数组。该 COMPUTED 节将在条目都存储 UserCommentEncoding 和 UserComment 在。两种情况下都可以使用条目 UserComment ，因此应优先使用 IFD0 部分中的值。

trans-unit.source: The tag UserComment has the same problem as the Copyright tag. It can store two values. First the encoding used, and second the value itself. If so the IFD section only contains the encoding or a byte array. The COMPUTED section will store both in the entries UserCommentEncoding and UserComment. The entry UserComment is available in both cases so it should be used in preference to the value in IFD0 section.
trans-unit.target: 标签UserComment与版权标签存在相同的问题。它可以存储两个值。首先是使用的编码，其次是值本身。如果是这样，则IFD部分仅包含编码或字节数组。该COMPUTED节将在条目都存储UserCommentEncoding和UserComment在。两种情况下都可以使用条目UserComment，因此应优先使用IFD0部分中的值。

trans-unit.source: The third parameter of ob_start() changed from a boolean parameter called erase (which, if set to FALSE, would prevent the output buffer from being deleted until the script finished executing) to an integer parameter called flags. Unfortunately, this results in an API compatibility break for code written prior to PHP 5.4.0 that uses the third parameter. See the flags example for an example of how to handle this with code that needs to be compatible with both.
trans-unit.target: ob_start（）的第三个参数从一个名为 erase 的布尔参数（如果设置为 FALSE ，它将防止在脚本执行完毕之前删除输出缓冲区）变为一个称为 flags 的整数参数。不幸的是，这会导致PHP 5.4.0之前使用第三个参数的代码的API兼容性中断。请参阅标志示例，以获取有关如何使用需要与两者兼容的代码处理此示例的示例。

trans-unit.source: The third parameter, attribs, contains an associative array with the element's attributes (if any).The keys of this array are the attribute names, the values are the attribute values.Attribute names are case-folded on the same criteria as element names.Attribute values are not case-folded. The original order of the attributes can be retrieved by walking through attribs the normal way, using each().The first key in the array was the first attribute, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 第三个参数 attribs 包含一个带有元素属性的关联数组（该数组的键是属性名称，值是属性值）。属性名称按与元素名称相同的条件进行大小写折叠。属性值不区分大小写。属性的原始顺序可以通过步行通过检索 attribs 以正常的方式，采用各（）数组中。第一密钥是第一属性，等等。

trans-unit.source: The time the cookie expires. This is a Unix timestamp so is in number of seconds since the epoch. In other words, you'll most likely set this with the time() function plus the number of seconds before you want it to expire. Or you might use mktime(). time()+60*60*24*30 will set the cookie to expire in 30 days. If set to 0, or omitted, the cookie will expire at the end of the session (when the browser closes).
trans-unit.target: Cookie过期的时间。这是Unix时间戳，以秒为单位，以秒为单位。换句话说，您很可能会使用time（）函数加上希望它过期之前的秒数来进行设置。或者您可以使用mktime（）。 time()+60*60*24*30 将cookie设置为在30天后过期。如果设置为0或省略，则cookie将在会话结束时（浏览器关闭时）过期。

trans-unit.source: The timer itself will do a best-effort at avoiding drift, that is, if a timer is configured to trigger every 10 seconds, then it will normally trigger at exactly 10 second intervals. If, however, the script cannot keep up with the timer because it takes longer than those 10 seconds to do) the timer will not fire more than once per event loop iteration.
trans-unit.target: 计时器本身将尽最大努力避免漂移，也就是说，如果将计时器配置为每 10 秒触发一次，则通常会以恰好 10 秒的间隔触发。但是，如果脚本不能跟上计时器的时间，因为该脚本花费的时间超过了 10 秒，则计时器在每次事件循环迭代中不会触发一次以上。

trans-unit.source: The timers are based on real time, that is, if one registers an event that times out after an hour and resets the system clock to January last year , it will still time out after(roughly) one hour. "Roughly" because detecting time jumps is hard, and some inaccuracies are unavoidable.
trans-unit.target: 计时器基于实时，也就是说，如果一个事件注册一个小时后超时，并将系统时钟重置为去年一月，它将仍然（大约）一个小时后超时。“大致”是因为很难检测到时间跳动，并且不可避免地会出现一些误差。

trans-unit.source: The transaction begun by sqlsrv_begin_transaction() includes all statements that were executed after the call to sqlsrv_begin_transaction() and before calls to sqlsrv_rollback() or sqlsrv_commit(). Explicit transactions should be started and committed or rolled back using these functions instead of executing SQL statements that begin and commit/roll back transactions. For more information, see » SQLSRV Transactions.
trans-unit.target: 由sqlsrv_begin_transaction（）开始的事务包括在调用sqlsrv_begin_transaction（）之后以及在调用sqlsrv_rollback（）或sqlsrv_commit（）之前执行的所有语句。应该使用这些函数来启动和提交显式事务，或者使用这些函数来回滚显式事务，而不是执行开始和提交/回滚事务的SQL语句。有关更多信息，请参见»SQLSRV Transactions。

trans-unit.source: The underlying libssh library doesn't support partial auths very cleanly That is, if you need to supply both a public key and a password it will appear as if this function has failed. In this particular case a failure from this call may just mean that auth hasn't been completed yet. You would need to ignore this failure and continue on and call ssh2_auth_password() in order to complete authentication.
trans-unit.target: 底层的libssh库并不十分清楚地支持部分身份验证。也就是说，如果您需要同时提供公共密钥和密码，它将显示为该函数失败。在这种特殊情况下，此调用失败可能只是意味着auth尚未完成。您将需要忽略此失败并继续并调用ssh2_auth_password（）来完成身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The unit types must be entered from the largest scale unit on the left to the smallest scale unit on the right. So years before months, months before days, days before minutes, etc. Thus one year and four days must be represented as P1Y4D, not P4D1Y.

trans-unit.source: The use of the \g sequence with a negative number signifies a relative reference. For example, (foo)(bar)\g{-1} would match the sequence "foobarbar" and (foo)(bar)\g{-2} matches "foobarfoo". This can be useful in long patterns as an alternative to keeping track of the number of subpatterns in order to reference a specific previous subpattern.
trans-unit.target: 所述的使用 \g 序列以负号表示的相对参考。例如， (foo)(bar)\g{-1} 将匹配序列“ foobarbar”，而 (foo)(bar)\g{-2} 匹配“ foobarfoo”。这在长模式中很有用，可以替代跟踪子模式的数量以引用特定的先前子模式。

trans-unit.source: The use of the \g sequence with a negative number signifies a relative reference. For example, (foo)(bar)\g{-1} would match the sequence "foobarbar" and (foo)(bar)\g{-2} matches "foobarfoo". This can be useful in long patterns as an alternative to keeping track of the number of subpatterns in order to reference a specific previous subpattern.
trans-unit.target: 所述的使用\克序列以负号表示的相对参考。例如，（foo）（bar）\ g {-1}将匹配序列“ foobarbar”，而（foo）（bar）\ g {-2}将匹配“ foobarfoo”。这在长模式中很有用，可以替代跟踪子模式的数量以引用特定的先前子模式。

trans-unit.source: The used algorithm, cost and salt are returned as part of the hash. Therefore, all information that's needed to verify the hash is included in it. This allows the password_verify() function to verify the hash without needing separate storage for the salt or algorithm information.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的算法，成本和费用作为哈希的一部分返回。因此，其中包含了验证哈希所需的所有信息。这允许password_verify（）函数验证哈希值，而无需单独存储盐或算法信息。

trans-unit.source: The valid range of a timestamp is typically from Fri, 13 Dec 1901 20:45:54 GMT to Tue, 19 Jan 2038 03:14:07 GMT. (These are the dates that correspond to the minimum and maximum values for a 32-bit signed integer). However, before PHP 5.1.0 this range was limited from 01-01-1970 to 19-01-2038 on some systems (e.g. Windows).
trans-unit.target: 时间戳的有效范围通常是从 Fri,13 Dec 1901 20:45:54 GMT 到 Tue,19 Jan 2038 03:14:07 GMT。这些日期对应于一个32位有符号整数的最小值和最大值)。然而,在 PHP 5.1.0 之前,这个范围在某些系统上被限制在 01-01-1970 到 19-01-2038 之间(例如 Windows)。

trans-unit.source: The valid range of a timestamp is typically from Fri, 13 Dec 1901 20:45:54 UTC to Tue, 19 Jan 2038 03:14:07 UTC. (These are the dates that correspond to the minimum and maximum values for a 32-bit signed integer.)
trans-unit.target: 时间戳的有效范围通常是从1901年12月13日20:45:54 UTC到2038年1月19日03:14:07 UTC。(这些日期对应于32位有符号整数的最小值和最大值。)

trans-unit.source: The value
trans-unit.target: 价值

trans-unit.source: The value FALSE may also be returned on failure, for instance after giving a date out of bounds on non-lenient mode; use exceptions or query intl_get_error_code() to disambiguate.
trans-unit.target: FALSE 值也可以在失败时返回，例如在非宽容模式下超出日期后；使用异常或查询intl_get_error_code（）消除歧义。

trans-unit.source: The value false may also be returned on failure, for instance after giving a date out of bounds on non-lenient mode; use exceptions or query intl_get_error_code() to disambiguate.
trans-unit.target: false 值也可能在失败时返回，例如在非宽容模式下超出日期后；使用异常或查询intl_get_error_code（）消除歧义。

trans-unit.source: The value accessed from functions, method calls, static class variables, and class constants inside {$} will be interpreted as the name of a variable in the scope in which the string is defined. Using single curly braces ({}) will not work for accessing the return values of functions or methods or the values of class constants or static class variables.
trans-unit.target: 从函数，方法调用，静态类变量和 {$} 中的类常量访问的值将被解释为定义字符串的作用域中的变量名。使用单个花括号（ {} ）无法访问函数或方法的返回值或类常量或静态类变量的值。

trans-unit.source: The value at offset index.
trans-unit.target: 偏移量 index 处的值。

trans-unit.source: The value at the front of the queue.
trans-unit.target: 排在队伍前面的数值。

trans-unit.source: The value at the requested index.
trans-unit.target: 要求的索引值。

trans-unit.source: The value at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定 index 处的值。

trans-unit.source: The value at the specified index or NULL.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引处的值或 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: The value at the specified index or null.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引处的值或 null 。

trans-unit.source: The value at the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: 栈顶的值。

trans-unit.source: The value at which the probability density is calculated
trans-unit.target: 计算概率密度时的数值。

trans-unit.source: The value at which the probability mass is calculated
trans-unit.target: 计算概率质量的值。

trans-unit.source: The value being appended.
trans-unit.target: 被附加的数值。

trans-unit.source: The value being searched for, otherwise known as the needle. An array may be used to designate multiple needles.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的值，也称为针。阵列可以用于指定多个针。

trans-unit.source: The value by which the variable associated with the key will get decremented. If the argument is a floating point number it will be truncated to nearest integer. The variable associated with the key should be of type long, otherwise the function fails and returns false.
trans-unit.target: 与 key 关联的变量将递减的值。如果参数是浮点数，它将被截断为最接近的整数。与 key 关联的变量的类型应为 long ，否则该函数将失败并返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: The value by which the variable associated with the key will get incremented. If the argument is a floating point number it will be truncated to nearest integer. The variable associated with the key should be of type long, otherwise the function fails and returns false.
trans-unit.target: 与 key 关联的变量的值将递增。如果参数是浮点数，它将被截断为最接近的整数。与 key 关联的变量的类型应为 long ，否则该函数将失败并返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: The value can be any valid PHP type except for resources, because those cannot be represented in a serialized form. If the Memcached::OPT_COMPRESSION option is turned on, the serialized value will also be compressed before storage.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以是除资源之外的任何有效PHP类型，因为资源不能以序列化形式表示。如果打开了 Memcached::OPT_COMPRESSION 选项，则序列化的值也将在存储之前被压缩。

trans-unit.source: The value can be any value.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以是任何值。

trans-unit.source: The value currently being iterated on.
trans-unit.target: 当前正在迭代的值。

trans-unit.source: The value for oauth_nonce.
trans-unit.target: oauth_nonce的值。

trans-unit.source: The value for the field.
trans-unit.target: 该字段的数值。

trans-unit.source: The value for the given option.
trans-unit.target: 给定 option 的值。

trans-unit.source: The value for the option.
trans-unit.target: 该期权的价值。

trans-unit.source: The value for this field.
trans-unit.target: 此字段的值。

trans-unit.source: The value given to the SERVER_ADMIN (for Apache) directive in the web server configuration file. If the script is running on a virtual host, this will be the value defined for that virtual host.
trans-unit.target: 在web服务器配置文件中给SERVER_ADMIN(Apache)指令的值。如果脚本是在虚拟主机上运行,那么这个值将是为这个虚拟主机定义的。

trans-unit.source: The value if the key exists, or NULL if the key wasn't part of the hash.
trans-unit.target: 如果键存在，则返回 NULL 如果键不属于哈希值，则返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: The value if the key exists, or null if the key wasn't part of the hash.
trans-unit.target: 如果键存在，则返回 null 如果键不属于哈希值，则返回null。

trans-unit.source: The value is given by the initial portion of the string. If the string starts with valid numeric data, this will be the value used. Otherwise, the value will be 0 (zero). Valid numeric data is an optional sign, followed by one or more digits (optionally containing a decimal point), followed by an optional exponent. The exponent is an 'e' or 'E' followed by one or more digits.
trans-unit.target: 该值由字符串的开头部分给出。如果字符串以有效的数字数据开头，则将是使用的值。否则，该值将为0（零）。有效数字数据是一个可选的符号，后跟一个或多个数字（可选地包含小数点），后跟一个可选的指数。指数是一个“ e”或“ E”，后跟一个或多个数字。
